game.name: Couples Love Album
game.description:
Wow! The bonding between this couple Cat Noir and Ladybug can make jealous of anyone. Today they are again ready to love with each other in a unique style. This time they want to carry a love album and, for this reason, they have planned to undergo a photo shoot. Yes, you are going to play the role of photo shooter in this brand new girls game. Your mission is to help your favorite couple to look cute for their cover photo in Couples Love Album.

Right from making changes in their outfits and hairstyles to providing them a perfect background location, you will have to do all on your own. Start with Ladybug by giving her a glittery blue top and pair it with a pink tulle skirt! She would look fabulous in a red top with ruffles and a matching midi skirt or a purple dress with big flower prints. Give your girl a lovely matching pair of high heels to complete her look in this HTML5 dressing game!

Feel try to try a blue top, a red and green polo t-shirt or a blue and yellow t-shirt and pair it with a pair of colorful shorts for Cat Noir! Choose a hammock, a bench or a couch to allow them to sit properly and a fabulous photo background in this brand new girls game! Apply some filters for the photo while adding some needful text and decoration work to the album cover! You can also add cute effects, frames and multiple types of fun things to make their album awesome. Check out more romantic and love games for free on atmegame.com and have fun without download!
